issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Cleanup usage of decodecomponent and use QueryStringDecoder from netty

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Upgrade netty-all jar to 4.0.37.Final version to fix latest vulnerabilities reported.

comments.body:
Upgrading to latest 4.0.52-Final version, the latest in 4.0 
As per the discussions in the HBASE-18891 there are no compatibility issues found with this release.

Basically reverted changes of HDFS-6662 and HDFS-7816 which seems to be fixed automatically in netty.

Changed the root pom.xml to run tests for all modules

This message was automatically generated.

Thanks for the patch [~vinayrpet].
bq. Basically reverted changes of HDFS-6662 and HDFS-7816 which seems to be fixed automatically in netty.
Is this change related to netty-all version upgrade?

bq. Is this change related to netty-all version upgrade?
This is related to ParameterParser bugs about decoding '+' and '%' in URI. With latest jar workarounds in HDFS code was no more necessary, Decoding tests passes without those workarounds and fails with those.

+1 (non-binding)
I have created a new  jira HADOOP-14929 for code cleanup of decodeComponent and remove usage of decodeComponent.

I am fine with cleanup up decodeComponent in a subsequent jira.
+1 for the patch.
I will commit this tomorrow, if there are no objections.
Would you undo dummy change in pom.xml when committing this?
Updated patch that removes the dummy change.
